ygData.subject: Crashing the game, AGAIN
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, I am getting ready to crash Gladiator again.  I deliberately let an elf get too much experience.  It only took me 3 scenarios to give the elf too much

Yes, I am getting ready to crash Gladiator again.  I deliberately let 
an elf get too much experience.  It only took me 3 scenarios to give 
the elf too much experience [for some unknown reason it's easier for 
an elf to crash the game with too much experience points than an 
archer.  The damn archer got some powerfull that I had to launch 
exploding bolt attacks from 1/4 of a mile away to avoid the 
aftershocks.  (I am convinced that, in real life, one of those 
exploding bolts would be powerfull enough to level NYC.)  Just j/k, 
but it was pretty far away.].

On the other hand, I discovered a new way to defeat opponents: fill 
the scenario with mega rocks.  Even a mage or an archmage can't dodge 
the rocks for very long.
